desc: Searching for experienced OpenCart Developer for OpenCart 2.2 Active Site.(Make a backup of the site - just in case)1. Upload an extension for us AjaxMegaFilterPro to the OpenCart 2.2 site. We need that first and very urgent - since we have no filter set now so it is impossible to sort by size/color/brand etc.2. Attach Google plus page to our site (we do have Google Plus Business pages created and working) somehow google does not see it we do have one. We know how to attach a google link to the site but I think we have two accounts created and if we transfer ownership from one page to the other - still google does not see us. I am just confused and I need to have that fixed since that matters in rankings. Every SEO test we do it tells us that we do not have a page for google plus....well we do but not marked correctly. (see attached)3. Indexing/SEO - improvement in SEO indexing....it is not that great now.Backlinks for the site - we do need that since we have only 155 backlinks - well that is too low. I mean quality links that are any value to the site. I do have a blog created on wordpress, and many links there but still need better indexing so we come up on the fist page.The site has SEO, H1, H2, Metatags, tags and all - so it is not the site.
